practice_phrases: I hope
我希望
I hope she knows
我希望她知道
I hope that's not a problem
我希望那不是问题
I hope you know my sister's friend
我希望你认识我姐姐的朋友
I hope she speaks Chinese
我希望她说普通话
I hope which of your friends speak Chinese
我希望你的哪些朋友说普通话
I hope most people I know speak Chinese
我希望我认识的大多数人说普通话
I hope people who like speaking Chinese are going to be there
我希望喜欢说普通话的人会在那里
I wonder if people I hope are going to be there
我想知道我希望的人会不会在那里
I hope she is going to be there
我希望她会在那里
I'll be able to speak soon
我很快能说
I hope I'll be able to speak soon
我希望我很快能说
I'll be able to speak Chinese soon
我很快能说普通话
I hope I'll be able to speak Chinese soon

I wonder if I'll be able to speak Chinese soon
我想知道我很快能不能说普通话
I'll be able to finish my coffee soon
我很快能喝完我的咖啡
I hope I'll be able to finish my coffee soon
我希望我很快能喝完我的咖啡
I wonder if I'll be able to be there soon
我想知道我很快能不能在那里
I hope I'll be able to know the answer soon
我希望我很快能知道答案
Do you know if I'll be able to speak Chinese soon
你知不知道我很快能不能说普通话
I'll be able to speak better
我能说得更好

我希望我能说得更好

I hope I'll be able to speak better soon
我希望我很快能说得更好
I wonder if I'll be able to speak better soon
我想知道我很快能不能说得更好

我认识的大多数人能说得更好
